newsitem.title: CANADA: Rand A Technology to acquire 2 U.S. firms.
newsitem.headline: Rand A Technology to acquire 2 U.S. firms.

text.p: Value-added computer reseller Rand A Technology Corp said on Tuesday it planned to acquire California-based reseller Avcom Group Inc and Texas-based reseller Advanced Data Graphics Inc.
Rand A also said it would acquire a 49 percent voting and equity interest in Avcom's affiliate One Direct Inc.

Rand said both acquisitions would be based on the companies' book values. Avcom's unaudited revenues for 1996 were about C$40 million, while Advanced Data Graphics had unaudited revenues of about C$8 million.
The acquisitions would be paid for with cash and Rand common shares and were expected to close on April 1.
